duck: How-to - A how-to is an informal, often short, description of how to accomplish some specific task.
Knowledge base - A knowledge base or knowledgebase (also KB or kb)) is a special kind of database for knowledge management.
tutorial definition: of, relating to, or involving a tutor or a tutorial.
Online Tutoring - Online tutoring is the process of tutoring in an online, virtual environment or networked environment in which teachers and learners are separated by time and space.
Teaching assistant - A teaching assistant or teacher's aide (TA) is an individual who assists a professor or teacher with instructional responsibilities.
A tutorial is a method of transferring knowledge and may be used as a part of a learning process.
Tutor - A tutor is an instructor who gives private lessons.
Tuition agency - A tuition agency is a commercial organisation which specialises in introducing tutors to students requiring help in the academic area.

wiki.text:
A 'tutorial' is a method of transferring knowledge and may be used as a part of
a learning process. More interactive and specific than a book or a lecture; a
tutorial seeks to teach by example and supply the information to complete a
certain task.

Depending on the context a tutorial can take one of many forms, ranging from a
set of instructions to complete a task to an interactive problem solving session
(usually in academia).
wiki.title: tutorial
